item.title: Leetcode 2189
item.description: 2189. Number of Ways to Build House of Cards I recommend looking at the non-memoized solution instead of the solution with dp to understand the main idea because it is a lot cleaner. In the image below, we can see three different colored triangles and two lines on the side colored yellow. This is to depict how I can place my triangles. I find the number of triangles I can make, and then I use two of my cards to make the yellow lines.
